    • Field Detail

      • myText

        protected java.lang.String myText
        Html-like text for showing Please note that the tooltip size is calculated dynamically based on the html so if the html content doesn't allow soft line breaks the tooltip can be too big for showing e.g.
        very nbsp; long nbsp; text nbsp; with nbsp; 'nbsp;' as spaces cannot be break
